metadata.title: CVE-2018-13250 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: libming 0.4.8 has a NULL pointer dereference in the getString function ofthe decompile.c file, related to decompileSTRINGCONCAT. Remote attackerscould leverage this vulnerability to cause a denial of service via acrafted swf file.

criterions.comment: ming: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
